description: This file defines a Kotlin singleton object 'SampleRepository' which provides in-memory access to media categories and items. It contains data for featured media entries, with methods to retrieve all categories, find items by ID, and perform search queries.

classes.name: Category
classes.description: Represents a media category with a list of MediaItem objects.

classes.name: MediaItem
classes.description: Represents a media entry with properties such as id, title, overview, category, poster and backdrop resources, year, and rating.

methods.name: categories
methods.description: Returns all categories with their items.

methods.name: byId
methods.description: Finds a media item by its unique ID.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Filters media items based on a search query matching title or overview.
